verbose_text: Furthermore, recent studies have reported that the expression level of Chi3l1 is increased in atherosclerotic aorta XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR and have demonstrated that increased plasma Chi3l1 is associated with endothelial dysfunction XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR and thromboembolic stroke XREF_BIBR and have suggested Chi3l1 as a diagnostic marker for cardiovascular diseases XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, whereas knockdown of Chi3l1 in ApoE -/- mice suppresses atherosclerotic plaque progression XREF_BIBR and abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) development XREF_BIBR.
evidence: Chi3l1 in ApoE -/-  mice suppresses atherosclerotic plaque progression  XREF_BIBR  and abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) development  XREF_BIBR
